param2:
终于，掌握了根源魔法的勇者率领后宫团向魔王的要塞耶力·比昂进发。
其友人，友人A也率领一众吃瓜群众。浩浩荡荡前往堡垒看戏。

终于，掌握了根源魔法的勇者率领后宫团
向魔王的要塞耶力·比昂进发。
其友人，友人A也率领一众吃瓜群众。
浩浩荡荡前往堡垒看戏。

“这是一段惊心动魄而又平淡甜蜜，
激动人心而又无比安详，gay里gay气并且橘里橘气，
剑与魔法的修魔修仙的超硬盒科幻的
历~险~记~”

随后，抗议者在一部分商人和贵族的支持下
以浪涌城为据点，成立了“伊利亚浪涌军”
浪涌军要求现任国家领袖迪塔利奥为浪涌城屠杀负责
要求他退位接受审判，并解散王国军和倒吊人组织。

港口都市浪涌城的庇护日巡游
演变成了一场全面的武装冲突与暴动
王国军和抗议者都使用了致命武力，血腥的冲突夺走了大量民众的生命
前往与抗议者对话的伊利亚王女伊南娜殿下也被以残忍的手法当众处决。

param3: 圣历999年3月，港口都市浪涌城

param2:
伊利亚内战随即全面爆发
这个地处关键位置的小国
再次烽烟四起，陷入战乱……

守法朝朝忧闷，强梁夜夜欢歌
损人利己骑马骡，正直公平挨饿
多修桥补路瞎眼，杀人放火儿多
我到西天问我佛，佛说我也没辙|豪杰打马上山坡，新坟倒比旧坟多

风雨飘摇之际
伊利亚现任的实际统治者
第一王子迪塔利奥在王都
为被害的伊南娜王女举行了国葬|在葬礼上
迪塔利奥驳斥了传言中浪涌城惨剧的成因
反而谴责了罗迪尼亚法皇国和先遣骑士团
一直煽动民众，激化了冲突
导致了浪涌城的惨剧|迪塔利奥王子呼吁民众站在伊利亚政府这边
团结一致，将外国势力，以及盘踞在浪涌城和旧都的叛匪彻底消灭
为伊利亚的独立与和平而战。

伴随着国葬和演说
士气大振的伊利亚王国军展开了全面的对反叛的镇压。

距离浪涌城屠杀已经过去了一个月
伊利亚不仅仅被内战的阴云笼罩
还遭到了外部势力的大规模干涉……

三方在各条战线上反复拉锯冲突
伊利亚烽烟四起
大批民众流离失所，陷入绝境。

其中，许多人逃往了东南部的矿坑城
盘踞在那里的邪教组织“黑暗之光”趁机开始了公开活动
成为一方毁灭性的势力，并且依靠着乱局与难民
飞快地扩张开来……

随着伊利亚王国发动反击镇压叛乱
骑士团和法皇国进一步大规模增兵
开始帮助诸方叛军，与王国军对抗。

其中，许多人逃往了东南部的矿坑城
盘踞在那里的邪教组织“黑暗之光”趁机开始了公开活动
成为一方毁灭性的势力，并且依靠着乱局与难民
飞快地扩张开来……

我阿瓦的回复i阿什顿口号第四发货的扣分
讲课SDA是阿萨的官方第四哦附件哦i扩大
哦i发欧派佛安排范德萨 发生地方撒发

就在前线的战局陷入胶着的时候
在伊利亚王国东部的矿坑城，发生了一起叛乱

十二万士兵旗结王都
他们将和要塞的八万守军汇合。
人类联军分兵五路
向魔王军的要塞进发。

锡斯坦娜冬季攻势
正式展开帷幕

战争持续了很久很久。
无论是人类还是魔族都已经厌倦了战争。
而人类聚集了优势兵力，
发起了有史以来最大的攻势。
false

铃兰之剑与骑士团签订了合作契约
骑士团将进驻小镇，彻底控制并保护这里
他们的下一步行动，是进攻十字路要塞
彻底控制这个重要的交通枢纽

这一切，都是为了包围那座
久攻不破的十字路要塞。
一场硬仗在所难免。
小镇成为了这次军事行动的起点。

骑士团与铃兰之剑签订了合作契约。
不久，骑士团军队开始陆续进驻小镇。
他们将这里作为了一个前沿据点构筑防御工事，整顿装备。
此外，他们还准备在小镇附近修筑一座营寨，以巩固自己的防御能力。

骑士团和法皇国的军队一起
将从两面对十字路要塞发起总攻
王国军的未来，似乎岌岌可危……

经过接连不断的奋战
骑士团终于在铃兰之剑的帮助下
完成了对十字路要塞的孤立
选项测试用地图演出

绝望的战火中，许多走投无路的人受到蛊惑
他们逃往了东南部的矿坑城
盘踞在那里的邪教组织“黑暗之光”趁机扩张
已经从隐秘行事，转为了公开活动

几周过去，战火如燎原之势席卷伊利亚
王国军，骑士团与法皇国，纷纷增兵
三方在各条战线上反复拉锯冲突
导致大批民众流离失所，陷入绝境

如今，骑士团展开了新一轮的大规模进军
目标再次瞄准了十字路要塞
为了避免骑士团快速击败王国军，法皇国表示
这次将站在王国军一边，阻止骑士团的进军

尽管骑士团对十字路要塞的围攻遭受了失败
但内忧外患的王国军却也无法进一步展开反攻
以十字路要塞一线为界，过去的数个月内
双方只能保持对峙，展开小规模的骚扰战|王国军没能乘胜追击，给了骑士团重整旗鼓的机会
此外，情报显示，尽管王国军取得了有限的胜利
但主张尽快与骑士团和谈的声音也逐渐出现
这进一步导致了王国军缺乏积极的战斗意志

经过与罗迪尼亚法皇国和王国军的艰难战斗
骑士团再一次完成了对十字路要塞的包围
这一次，骑士团展现出了前所未有的决心
务求通过一场战略决战彻底解决伊利亚问题|而另一方面，在罗迪尼亚法皇国的帮助下
王国军大大强化了十字路要塞的防御
决定伊利亚未来的最终战役一触即发
而铃兰之剑，也承担了重要的进攻任务……

岌岌可危的王国军放弃了对伊利亚河的封锁
向着王都集结，准备凭借王都做最终的抵抗|本就失去了大部分国土和几乎所有的资源
大量绝望的难民涌入王都更是雪上加霜
任何人都明白，战局已经无法逆转|到底是战是和
王国军必须做出选择……

已经夺得十字路要塞的骑士团
显然不会满足于眼前的胜利
稍作休整后，骑士团向王都发起了进攻|伊利亚王国军自然不会坐以待毙
他们构建了层层防线，试图迟滞骑士团的进攻
并且派出游击部队，配合倒吊人
扰乱骑士团的后方|新一轮的战火
再次燃烧了起来

尽管王国军做出了最大的努力
但在巨大的实力差距面前
还是无法阻挡骑士团推进到王都城下|面对近在眼前的胜利，骑士团的士气空前高涨
另一边，王国军却士气低落，物资匮乏
双方将围绕王都，展开最后的决战
但显然这场战役的结果，并没有太多悬念

付出了巨大的代价后，骑士团终于攻陷了王都
大量支持迪塔利奥的贵族，主战派官员
以及倒吊人的成员都被关押或处决
王都的陷落，标志着伊利亚内战的正式结束|也意味着，奥古斯特终于可以腾出手来
解决骑士团内部的一些问题了……

尽管有传言骑士团会在取得胜利后进行和谈
但骑士团还是展开了全方位的进军
骑士团的大军跨过伊利亚河，向王都挺进|现在只有两条路摆在伊利亚王国的面前
投降等待骑士团的裁决
或是进行一场没有任何胜算的防御战|而在此时，一直身为骑士团密切盟友的
鲁特菲
主动申请了正面攻击王都的任务
似乎这也是他计划的一部分……

骑士团第二王子线P7
伊利亚内战结束-0013

持续一年多的第二次伊利亚内战
随着伊利亚第一王子迪塔利奥被捕而终结
王都晨曦堡开城投降|作为这场战争的绝对胜利者
骑士团与临时监国的鲁特菲签订了条约
只不过，你关心的只有鲁特菲准备如何处理骑士团
这个笼罩在伊利亚头上的庞然大物……

伴随着国葬和演说
士气大振的王国军，再次投入了战斗

在铃兰之剑的帮助下
经过与罗迪尼亚法皇国和王国军的艰难作战
骑士团再一次彻底地完成了
对十字路要塞的包围|这一次，骑士团展现出了前所未有的决心
他们排除了一切可能排除的不稳定因素
务求通过一场战略决战彻底解决伊利亚问题|另一方面，似乎是早有准备的，在罗迪尼亚法皇国的帮助下
王国军大大强化了十字路要塞的防御
显然，他们也准备让骑士团和浪涌军
在坚固的城防设施下流尽最后一滴血|毫无疑问，这场最后的会战的胜利者
将会赢下赌桌上的全部筹码
而铃兰之剑也将通过这场战斗
决定自己与伊利亚的未来……

讲展示出了他本人抵抗外敌的非凡决心
极大地鼓舞了伊利亚王国军的士气

损人利己骑马骡，正值公平挨饿

如果情况紧急，请您@小百合

The Union's fresh reserves arrived in Iria,
setting their sights on the strategically located Crossroads Keep.
|Iria and Vlder had finally made a pact,
joining forces once again to resist a common enemy.
Iria will face its ultimate test in this war.

The battle on the frontlines had finally begun.
The tide of the battle would ebb back and forth with neither side giving way.
The rear troops ceaselessly replenished the front line,
without giving a moment's respite.
|However, the Xavier led unit of King's Army, which bears the brunt of the
onslaught continued to fight.
Unfortunately, it wasn't enough to turn the tide of the battle.
|The enemy sensed the opportunity and attack,
putting the King's Army into a dangerous situation...

The fierce battle at the keep had finally come to an end.
The King's Army and its allies have successfully resisted
the onslaught of the Union.
|Due to numerous setbacks,
the Union took heavy losses,
forcing them to withdraw to Waverun City
and wait for reinforcements.

在你的努力下，黑暗之光现已被铲除
流离失所的难民终于得以返回归处
然而神官们却将所有溢美之词集于法皇国上
对法皇国伟业的赞美在民间流传开来……

Thanks to your efforts, the Darklight were eradicated.
The displaced refugees were finally able to return to their homes.
However, the church elite claimed the credit for the Papal States.
Admiration and praise for them bloomed among the people...

Those in the old aristocracy conspired together
and attempted to take over Mornrays Castle.
But, within just a few days Dantalion had crushed the coup.
|He ordered for the immediate execution of all those involved.
Any surviving aristocrats were placed under house arrest.
|Subsequently, the Hanged Men conducted a comprehensive
investigation of the aristocrats. 
They found letters, documents, and other clues all leading back
to the Papal States. 
|Despite their attempts at claiming innocence, 
the trust between Iria and the Papal States could never be rebuilt.

After the Union reinforcements landed in Waverun City,
the Union regrouped and pressed on Crossroads Keep.
This time, the knights and their allies vowed that victory
would be their claim.
|The King's Army also began preparations for battle.
Elamanian merchants arrived with resources and armaments,
and the King's Army used these to boost their military might.
|Reinforcements from both Luccia and Vlder
also stood to gain much from the Union's defeat
and stood firm in their support of the King's Army.
Crossroads Keep once again sounded the alarm, and the battle had begun.

The soldiers fighting on behalf of Iria
gave their lives to resist the invading knights.
The Union suffered heavy losses
and could not keep up their siege of Crossroads Keep.
|The tide of the war had changed.
The Union, no longer holding the advantage, had no choice but to negotiate.
|In the end, the King's Army was declared victorious, 
but it was not without sacrifice.
Soon after, news of Lutfi's secret arrest at the hands of the Union
began to spread like wildfire.

The negotiations following the Battle of Crossroads failed.
The Union refused to surrender Auguste, the war criminal,
and he led the remaining members of the Order back to Waverun City.
|There Auguste made his last stand.
Dantalion ordered a crushing assault,
commanding that no one should be spared.
|However, the choice in conducting Dantalion's orders,
is up to the Sword of Convallaria.

With the Union's growing internal strife,
their plan for a counterattack proved impossible.
|With the confirmation of his crucial role in
inciting the tragedy of Waverun City
and the Irian civil war, Auguste was put on trial.
|Gloria led the remaining members of the Order
in their surrender to Irian authorities.
The two sides then signed a peace treaty,
and the Advance Order returned back to the Union.
|Dissent was brewing amongst members of the Council.
Some felt that the Union's internal conflicts
must be dealt with first, in order to avoid further losses.

With the Union's growing internal strife,
their plan for a counterattack proved impossible.
|With the confirmation of his crucial role in
inciting the tragedy of Waverun City
and the Irian civil war, Auguste was put on trial.
|Gloria led the remaining members of the Order
in their surrender to the Irian authorities.
The two sides then signed a peace treaty,
and the knights returned to the Union.
|Dissent was brewing amongst members of the Council.
Some felt that the Union's internal conflicts
must be dealt with first, in order to avoid further losses.

The remains of Silver Wolf Mercenary Group soldiers
were brought home by survivors.
From then on, the Luccians no longer participated 
in the war between Iria and the Union,
|The bodies of the Vlderians, however, were left unclaimed,
with only the crows circling overhead.
There was no longer a homeland to bury them.

In order to bring the Mine Pit back into the territory of Iria,
Dantalion sent in the King's Army.
The people met the soldiers head on in a violent confrontation.
Dantalion responded in kind and launched an all-out assault on the city.

The Darklight was once again expelled
from the Mine Pit. 
And with it, liberation from outside influences. 
It now serves as a haven for refugees who have fled the war, 
many of whom are Vlderians.
|To protect themselves, they have created an army
and have established autonomy. 
Dantalion, who expelled the foreign enemies, has taken notice.

Rumors began to swirl that tensions among the royal family
were growing by the minute. Soldiers were forced to pick sides,
Prince Dantalion or King Faris.
Brutality and violence sprung forth from both parties.
|Still, among all the chaos, the Sword of Convallaria seemed
far removed from it. From afar, time continued to pass day by day...

With the Mine Pit openly declaring its resistance,
unhappy citizens around the country became inspired.
|Once again, the flames of rebellion burned in the 
hearts of Irians from all edges of the country.
Additional forces were raised in various places with the aim
of overthrowing the tyranny.

Outside Mornrays Castle, many villages and towns
have been reduced to just desolate battlefields. 
In the beginning, the King's Army could rely on the
castle's tactical advantage to easily crush the rebels.
|But as more Irians joined the resistance, 
their strength could no longer be so easily opposed. 
As the rebellion grew, the King's Army began to break down.

Waverun City is a port on the coast of Western Iria,
and the origin of the riots.
Mobs publicly executed the Irian Princess and looted the city.
This incident has drawn the attention of multiple factions.
|The Union of Knight States sent an Advance Order across the sea.
They occupied Waverun City in the name of justice,
supporting the rebellion in their fight against the Crown.
|In an attempt to suppress the insurgents and reclaim Waverun,
the King's Army also massed troops at Mornrays Castle.
|With war now on the cusp of exploding, even more forces are eyeing Iria.
The Papal States of Rodinia, a powerful country in the south,
kept a silent eye on the situation in the name of protecting
the Light of Sanctuary in Iria.
|War looms over the horizon.

With their commanders gone, the King's Army scattered the field,
their ranks in chaos.
The resistance pushed onward; their sights set on Mornrays Castle.
However, upon their arrival, they were given an unexpected surprise:
The castle, it seemed, was already occupied...

In the following days of fighting,
the King's Army had finally turned the tide of battle.
It was a long overdue victory, but the Union's advance had come to a halt.
|Both sides began to call for support from the surrounding areas.
The war has thus entered a new stage.

Prince Dantalion's passionate speech at the Princess's funeral
showed his own extraordinary determination to resist foreign enemies
which greatly boosted the morale of Iria King's Army.

It has been a month since the Waverun City incident,
and the counter-insurgency action by the King's Army was still in a deadlock.
In this period of unrest, Prince Dantalion held a state funeral
for the murdered Princess Inanna in the Mornrays Castle.
|At the funeral, Dantalion refuted the rumors about the Waverun City incident
and claimed that the Papal States and the Union had orchestrated it.
He called on the people to unite and to expel the invaders.
|The funeral and the speech galvanized the King's Army
before they went to the war again.

Just as the war at the front line halted, a rebellion
occurred at the Mine Pit east of the Kingdom of Iria.
|The Darklight, an evil organization that had occupied this place
for a long time, announced their full autonomy over the Mine Pit
and began to expand to the surrounding areas.
|Lots of refugees were bewitched by the doctrines of "trial" and 
"punishment" and became accomplices with the Darklight.
|After defeating several troops of the King's Army,
Darklight had become an evil force that couldn't be neglected.
|Their followers spread out, causing destruction by pillaging,
and ruthlessly suppressing those who resisted.
They even dispatched scouts to the surrounding areas of the town...

The Sword of Convallaria signed a contract of partnership with the Union.
The Order would settle to completely control and protect the town.
|The Union's next move was to attack the Crossroads Keep taking total
control of this key transportation junction. To achieve this goal, the Order
was going to build a military camp near the town as a supply center.
|The Sword of Convallaria would play a significant role in the construction...

After continuous fighting,
the Order and Sword of Convallaria succeeded in isolating Crossroads Keep.
|The armies of the Union and the Papal States will launch a general attack
from both sides. 
|The future of the King's Army
seems to be in jeopardy...

In the desperate war, many helpless civilians were beguiled
and fled to the Mine Pit in the southeast.
|The Darklight, who had forcibly occupied the Mine Pit,
took the opportunity to expand. After that, they stopped 
hiding and came out into open.

A few weeks later, the war was raging like wildfire in Iria.
The King's Army, the Union, and the Papal States continued 
to build up forces.
|And so, the three sides clashed on all fronts.
As a result, many people were displaced and desperate.

Although the Union's siege on Crossroads Keep failed,
the King's Army, beset by internal and external troubles,
couldn't muster the strength to counterattack. 
|Over the past few months, the two factions have faced off,
using the Keep as a dividing line, engaging in minor skirmishes
rather than full-scale battles.
|The King's Army's unsuccessful assault gave the Union an opportunity
to recover its forces. Moreover, intelligence reports indicate that
despite some victories, there is a growing desire among the populace
for the King's Army to seek peace talks with the Union.
|This sentiment has further sapped the King's Army's resolve
to continue fighting.

After the tough battle with the Papal States and the King's Army,
the Union once again surrounded Crossroads Keep.
This time, the knights showed their steadfast 
determination, vowing to take over Crossroads Keep.
|However, the King's Army was able to greatly strengthen 
the defenses of Crossroads Keep, with the help of the Papal States.
|The Sword of Convallaria has undertaken 
the mission of attacking the fortress...
which will decide the fate of Iria.

Despite the best efforts of the King's Army,
they failed to stop the Order from advancing to Mornrays Castle.
|With victory at hand, the morale of the Order was at an all-time high.
However, the King's Army was demoralized and lacked supplies.
The two sides will launch the final battle around Mornrays Castle.
But the victor of the battle is already clear...

After paying a heavy price, the Order finally brought down Mornrays Castle.
|Lots of aristocrats supporting Dantalion, officers in favor of the war,
and members of the Hanged Men were imprisoned or executed.
|The fall of the Mornrays Castle marks the official end
of the civil war in Iria.
|It also means that Auguste finally has the time
to solve the internal problems of the Advance Order...

骑士同盟并未与伊利亚王国和谈
骑士团跨过伊利亚河，向王都挺进|伊利亚王国进退两难
投降会遭受骑士同盟的裁决
而据城死守毫无胜算|此时，鲁特菲主动承担起主攻晨曦堡的任务
这似乎是他计划的一部分……

王都晨曦堡开城投降
伊利亚第一王子迪塔利奥被捕
骑士同盟与掌权的鲁特菲签订了条约
持续一年多的伊利亚战争终于宣告结束|但鲁特菲，又准备如何处理
骑士同盟这个庞然大物……

It has been a month since the Waverun City incident,
and the counter-insurgency action by the King's Army was still in a deadlock.
In this period of unrest, Prince Dantalion held a state funeral
for the murdered Princess Inanna in the Mornrays Castle.
|At the funeral, Dantalion refuted the rumors about the Waverun City incident
and said that the Papal States and the Union had orchestrated it.
He called on the people to unite and to expel the invaders.
|The funeral and the speech boosted the King's Army
and they went to the war again.

Now, the Union has initiated a new round of large-scale advances
to reclaim control over Crossroads Keep once again.
|In an effort to prevent the Union from swiftly defeating
the King's Army, the Papal States have declared their support for Iria,
pledging to halt the Union's advancing forces.

The grueling second Crossroads Keep battle
finally ended with the victory of the Union,
meaning that the Union has gained decisive advantages.
|The weakened King's Army gave up holdings at the Iria River.
Now gathering at Mornrays Castle, they prepare
to make their final stand while leveraging the castle.
|Having lost most of their land and almost all their resources,
the desperate refugees are now swarming to the Mornrays Castle
to make matters worse.
|Everyone knows that the war is untenable.
Now the King's Army must decide whether to fight or surrender...

The Union who has occupied the Crossroads Keep
would not be satisfied with only victory.
After a short rest, the Order attacked Mornrays Castle.
But the King's Army of Iria wouldn't give up so easily.
|They had built up layers of defenses to halt the Order's advances
and sent out guerrilla units with the Hanged Men
to disrupt the rear of the Order.
The next stage of battle looms on the horizon...

param2:
付出了巨大的代价后，骑士团终于攻陷了王都
大量支持迪塔利奥的贵族，主战派官员
以及倒吊人的成员都被关押或处决
王都的陷落，标志着伊利亚内战的正式结束|也意味着，奥古斯特终于可以腾出手来
解决骑士团内部的一些问题了……

param0:
The second civil war in Iria which lasted more than a year
ended with the arrest of Prince Dantalion.
The Mornrays Castle, the capital, opened its gate to surrender.
|As the absolute winner of this war,
the Union signed a treaty with Lutfi, the second prince of the kingdom.
However, all you care about is what Lutfi will do with the Union,
the great threat to Iria...

param2:
尽管王国军做出了最大的努力
但在巨大的实力差距面前
还是无法阻挡骑士团推进到王都城下|面对近在眼前的胜利，骑士团的士气空前高涨
另一边，王国军却士气低落，物资匮乏
双方将围绕王都，展开最后的决战
但显然这场战役的结果，并没有太多悬念

param0:
Although it was rumored that the Union would hold peace talks
after their victory, the Order continued their advance,
marching towards Mornrays Castle after crossing the Iria River.
|Now, there are two options in front of the Kingdom of Iria,
surrender to the Union or draw out the fight until certain defeat.
|At this time, Lutfi, who has been a close ally of the Union,
took up the task of launching a frontal assault against Mornrays Castle.
Let us see what he has in store for us...

On the other hand, The Papal States of Rodinia in the south also took advantage
and occupied the previous capital, Lightgloam City,
reinforcing the Waverun Legion.
|This small country, strategically located in a key position,
is at war again...

The situation deteriorated rapidly. The military power,
the Union of Knight States, declared
their support for "the demands of Irians against tyranny."
|They dispatched the Advance Order and controlled the
surrounding area of Waverun City.

In March of 999 in the Radiant Calendar, the Sanctuary Day
parade in Waverun City turned into an armed conflict,
in which many civilians perished or were injured. 
|Princess Inanna of Iria who had tried to speak with the demonstrators
had also died during the incident.
|A few days later, the demonstrators formed the "Waverun Legion."
They advocated that the current national leader, Prince Dantalion,
should be responsible for the Waverun City incident.
|They claimed he should relinquish power, and stand trial.
Dantalion, however, claimed this was nothing but slander and rebellion,
and so formed an army to quell the uprising.

That evening, a grand celebration was held at Crossroads Keep.
Irians, Vlderians, and Luccians all took part in the merriment.
|Dantalion praised the achievements of both the Sword of Convallaria
and his allies, and generously rewarded the soldiers.
|At the end of his speech, Dantalion cursed
the betrayal of the corrupt aristocrats.
He swore that just punishment would be carried out.
漫漫长夜，不知何时才能迎来黎明的曙光

随着伊利亚战事的逐渐升级
兵强马壮的骑士同盟扭转了初期的被动局面
王国军被迫将防线后撤至十字路要塞——
这座控制着伊利亚中心区域的坚固要塞|在战争阴云的掩护下
邪教组织黑暗之光趁乱而起
以矿坑城为据点，将魔爪伸向四方
而铃兰小镇正首当其冲……|在萨曼莎的援助下，铃兰之剑击退了黑暗之光
为了对抗黑暗之光的威胁
你们选择与法皇国签订了长期契约

With Fernando in chains and Tranquillo at large,
the remnants of the Darklight Order were vanquished,
and the religion was abandoned by its followers.
|After their tireless struggle for freedom, 
the Mine Pit found themselves under the rule of the Papal States,
but doubts about their intentions began to fill the air.

Now, you and Samantha journey to Lightgloam City for an audience
with one of the highest authorities in the Papal States.

The war in Iria continued to escalate.
King's Army maintained their morale 
despite the advanced weaponry of the Union.
A protracted back-and-forth conflict erupted around Crossroads Keep.
|Both armies desperately sought to expand their territory.
Eventually, even the destruction could be seen near the Town of Convallaria.

As the Papal States continued to ramp up its activity within Iria,
the siege of Crossroads Keep had finally come to an end.
|Under the leadership of Prince Dantalion, the King's Army
managed to repel the Union onslaught, but at the cost of thousands of lives. 
Both sides now lacked the strength to go on the offensive,
and so, the fighting ceased, for now...

King's Army disclosed the evidence provided by Miguel to everyone—
Papal States secretly intensified and exploited the situation in Waverun City.
Like the Union, it was one of the instigators of the Waverun City tragedy.
|Also, the Papal States led the assassination of two princes
and put the blames on the Union in order to kill two birds with one stone.
|After the evidence was released, the whole country was in uproar
What Papal States must face now is an Iria unprecedentedly united by anger.
|The peace you craved has been doomed to be unattainable...

The pro-Papal States forces represented by the old aristocrats
took advantage of the political turmoil in Iria, forming an alliance
with Papal States with the goal of overthrowing the Union.

Amidst the chaos of the two princes' simultaneous deaths,
Dantalion and Lutfi, the Papal States took the initiative
in accusing the Union of being the mastermind of the assassination.
|The Union denied the charges, and insinuated the Papal States
of being the true orchestrators of the situation.
|However, the Papal States released evidence that
proved the Union was behind the Waverun City tragedy.
Irians were all shocked and the populace
turned sharply in favor of the Papal States.

Lightgloam City, once the capital of Iria when it was a puppet state,
now serves as the seat of the Papal States' ambitions.
|Now, a nation, once shackled and exploited, has routed its enemies
to their last stronghold, recapturing most of its territories.
|At present, only Lightgloam City, the last fortress, remains.

The plan you created was carried out successfully.
In addition, the rebels led by Edda announced that
they would join the King's Army.
More Irians oppressed by the Papal States have risen in rebellion.
|Iria's military and civilians with unprecedented high morale
united under the banner of Queen Inanna.

As the revolt of the Irian people grew in intensity, the weakened and 
exhausted Papal States became unable to launch any further offensives.
The situation was becoming even more unfavorable towards the Papal States.

The bishop, Caris, summoned Samantha and you to Lightgloam City.
There you were asked to go on a diplomatic mission to Mornrays Castle again
for peace talks with Princess Inanna.
This time, Caris promised a series of major concessions.
|Although the chances were still slim,
facing the war that had already sacrificed too much.
Samantha who longed for peace accepted the task
like it was finding her salvation.
|When you leave the hall,
a young girl stops in your way.

Taair's death had little impact on the situation.
But as the revolt of the Irian people grew in intensity, the weakened and 
exhausted Papal States became unable to launch any further offensives.
The situation was becoming even more unfavorable towards the Papal States.

Princess Inanna delivered an impassioned speech,
calling on all Irians to unite in defense of their country.
The rallied Irians proved stronger than the Papal States anticipated,
blocking their offensive and forcing them back into Waverun City.
|In Waverun City, the people were growing increasingly opposed
to the Papal States rule forcing a crackdown on dissent.

With the peace talks in shambles, the Papal States and Iria
launched an all-out war. 
The Papal States claimed the abandoned Waverun City and set
the cycle into motion once again...

In the end, the coalition forces of Iria and the Papal States
triumphed, their victory decisive.
The Union was completely routed with its front line decimated.
Auguste and his knights, seeing that the die had been cast, fled the field.
A great celebration was held in Lightgloam City to commemorate the victory.
The Sword of Convallaria's outstanding performance in the decisive battle
earned high praise from Bishop Caris herself.
|The Union's strength eroded, and its very existence came into question.
Iria, on the other hand, was now governed by old aristocrats,
supporters of the Papal States. It was clear that Caris's plan
was coming to fruition, and victory was at hand.
|It seemed to all that peace was but a breath away.

这场决战最终以伊利亚法皇国联军的胜利告终
骑士同盟兵败如山倒，再也无法维持战线
奥古斯特与剩余的骑士们从海路仓皇逃窜|战后，法皇国在暮光城举办了隆重的封赏仪式
铃兰之剑也因在决战中的出色表现
受到了卡丽丝枢机卿的亲自褒奖|军力强盛的骑士同盟被逐出了这个角力的舞台
而当下在伊利亚执政的又是亲法皇国的旧贵族
一切都如卡丽丝的计划，全面胜利就在眼前|无论你们如何看待这一切
和平，似乎真的只有一步之遥了……

With the escalation of the war in Iria,
the Union drove the King's Army back to Crossroads Keep,
a central bastion of Iria that holds a significant positional advantage.
|Seeing an opportunity, the Darklight, a group of fanatical cultists,
took over the Mine Pit and sent their forces into the surrounding area,
eventually laying siege to The Town of Convallaria.
|With the help of Samantha, the Sword of Convallaria drove off the cultists
and allied with the Papal States to fight the Darklight.
It's going to be a long war with an unknown future.

Meanwhile, Bishop Caris has issued a secret order.
You are to receive it in the town...

You resolved to end all this with your own hands—
to put a stop to a war that should never have happened,
and to find a true path to the light...

The de facto ruler of Iria, Prince Dantalion, has persuaded various
forces to form a coalition.
Relying on the strategic stronghold of Crossroads Keep,
they thwarted the first offensive launched by the Advance Order.

In the year 999 of the Radiant Calendar,
a riot in Waverun City plunged the Kingdom of Iria into chaos.
On the pretext of safeguarding the public and judging the culprits of the tragedy,
the Union organized the Advance Order to enter Iria.

The fate of Iria will be decided by the capture of Crossroads Keep.
After a brief respite, both forces are once again locked
in a brutal tug-of-war. On the lengthy battlefront, both attackers
and defenders are desperately seeking a decisive breakthrough...

On the Papal States side, the forces that reunited in the name of restoration
fell into chaos after losing their legal and moral foundation.
Loyalists to the old royal family chose to follow Taair,
but most mercenaries and integrated armed groups have fled.
|As Iria advanced even closer to victory, 
the battle resumed in a lopsided manner.

Under the mediation of the Samantha,
Princess Inanna unexpectedly agreed to restart peace talks.
Held in Mornrays Castle as a clandestine meeting,
the peace talks yielded a surprising outcome.
|King Faris, who had lived in seclusion for many years, would officially 
abdicate and hand over the throne to Prince Taair of the old State of Iria.
Princess Inanna would personally preside over the ceremony, signifying
the successful restoration of the State of Iria.
|However, it also meant Iria would once again become a puppet state
ruled by the Papal States.
Bishop Caris found the sudden victory unbelievable,
and the terms were difficult for many Irians to accept.
|Despite the skepticism, Princess Inanna's unwavering resolve
ensured the preparation of the ceremony, marking the abdication
of the old king and the ascension of the new...

The plan advances, but the upcoming coordination
and mediation seem more complicated than expected...

After meticulous preparations, the grand Convallaria Festival kicked
off as scheduled. Merchants flocked to the event, and dignitaries
from various factions arrived in succession. The Town of Convallaria
was abuzz with extraordinary excitement.
|To your surprise, the Union and the King's Army, 
who had been silent with no replies, also sent Safiyyah 
and Gloria as their representatives to attend.

Despite the slim chances of victory, to protect the town,
you decide to engage the enemy in a fight to the death.

For the town, already drained of resources, 
this is undoubtedly adding insult to injury...
|Despite Samantha's warning, you no longer 
have ample time to prepare for battle.

Through the scorching sands and storms,
what awaits you at the journey's end?
Will it be the blade that cuts through the impasse,
or a mirage of a bustling marketplace?

The Darklight looms, casting a shadow so vast that trade
at the Trading Post has been at a standstill for a long time.
In search of a breakthrough, you decide to head
to the eastern border of Iria—Rabi'a Oasis.

To reverse the current predicament, 
the Trading Post urgently needs to grow and develop...

Trade routes blocked, sales plummeting,
capital flow hindered—merchants hoard goods,
causing prices to soar...

The town's Trading Post is on the rise,
yet the Darklight, like clouds obscuring the dawn,
is rapidly expanding and spreading within the Kingdom of Iria.

The Darklight is on the horizon, preparing for an
all-out assault on the Town of Convallaria.

To put an end to this war once and for all,
there's one crucial step left—To completely
undercut their superiority in arms trading.

Out of a strong demand for peace, all factions withheld
the necessary armaments for war. The Union and
the King's Army are forced to cease fire temporarily.
|The struggle for Crossroads Keep has reached a stalemate.
The sudden interruption of the conflict has affected the 
interests of those profiting from the war, who are restless 
and ready to reignite the flames of war at any opportunity.

The defeat of the Darklight temporarily lifted the long-standing
shadow over the town.
|Thanks to your efforts, the lives of the townspeople gradually
returned to normal. Trade routes opened, prices stabilized, and
trade with various factions recovered.

However, although the overt war has ended,
the struggle over interests and justice has only just begun...

Under pressure, the Union and the King's Army agreed to a ceasefire
to participate in the investigation.
|Inanna, heeding the call of the people, took charge of the situation.
|She declared Crossroads Keep a temporary neutral zone,
and vowed to thoroughly investigate the Waverun City incident,
promising to restore truth and peace to the people of Iria.

The events at the peace conference caused an uproar among the populace.
With the Papal States' intentions exposed, people generally believed
that all three powers were involved. Rumors about the Waverun City
tragedy were rampant.

Due to shortages of both food and medicine, hunger and injury still torment them.
|Your kindness, resilience, and wisdom will become their only hope to sustain
everyone through these dire times.

The Union and the King's Army of Iria have been at war for days.
Refugees are fleeing Waverun City in droves
and making their way to the Town of Convallaria.

The Union has suddenly declared an attack on Crossroads Keep.
Yet, the skirmishes began even before the battle clashed.
|Prince Lutfi, as usual, procured food from the Convallaria Trading Post.
As he distributed food to the people and gained favorable reputation,
a massive series of food poisoning incidents unexpectedly occurred.
|This became a public scandal that the King's Army wielded against the Union.

Lutfi had no choice but to shift the responsibility onto you.
Thus, the Convallaria Trading Post quickly fell into a whirlwind
of controversy. To stabilize the hard-won economic development,
you must quickly clear the Trading Post's name.

The battle for Crossroads Keep had erupted...
resulting in a stalemate with neither side gaining a decisive advantage.
|Ultimately, both paid a heavy price, yet the battle lines
remained unchanged.
|This war was set to continue…

Mine Pit and the Vlder Tribes have jointly announced
to all of Iria the formation of a new Luxite mining consortium
named "Fox and Squirrel".

Fortunately, due to your long-term efforts to actively unite 
and build alliances with other forces, more and more people 
were inclined to resolve disputes through mutual interests. 
Calls for a ceasefire began to emerge in Vlder and Mine Pit.

The aftermath of the first battle at Crossroads Keep has not yet subsided.
The Union and the King's Army suddenly announced a second showdown at
Crossroads Keep was imminent.
|As the news broke, the people's cries of sorrow filled the air.
For too long had the land been engulfed in ash and the flames of war...

A new and powerful source of supply has finally emerged in the Luxite market. 
No one could predict the impact this would have on the war situation yet, 
but the Convallaria Trading Post, closely associated with this organization, 
was bound to see a further increase in strength.

新的有力货源终于在晶石市场上出现
暂时无人能预测这将对战局产生怎样的影响
但与此组织关系密切的铃兰商会
实力必将得到进一步的提升。

这对目前财殚力尽的小镇来说
无疑是雪上加霜……|虽然有萨曼莎的提醒
但是你们已经没有充足的时间备战

尽管胜利的希望渺茫
但为了保护小镇
你们决定与敌人殊死一搏

黑暗之光即将来袭
将对铃兰小镇进行一次大规模攻击
